reviews.review:
Un juego que me gusta mucho, no tengo tantas horas solamente porque quiero comprarme otro procesador para poder jugar sin que se me trabe el juego, pero este juego esta muy bien hecho en todo, no muchos amigos lo tienen y me gustaria que le presten mas atencion a este juegazo.

Si es verdad que parece que es lo mismo que el Friday 13th pero si lo jugas por tu cuenta te das cuenta que son muy diferentes y que cada uno tiene sus cosas buenas y malas.

100% Recomendado B)

es ist sehr empfelendswert da man Killer  oder überlebender sein darf. außerdem ist es ein gutes horrorgame . aber das beste ist das Archiv und das es immer mehr Killer/überlebende gibt wie zum bespiel aus der serie stranger fings. Das archiv  ist dazu da um mehr Blutpunkte zu bekomen mit denen man den Killer oder überlebenden besser macht. Natürlich sind Blutpunkte erst die Belohnung  .Im archiv kannst du dir eine überlebender oder killer herausforderung aussuchen.   natürlich gibt es noch viel mehr. Leider nicht mehr empfehlenswert. Am Anfang bevor die Entwickler angefangen haben den Killern alles in den Arsch zu blasen war das Spiel sehr gut ausbalanciert. Mittlerweile wir den Killern alles gegeben, sodass man schon geistig zurückgeblieben sein muss, damit man als Killer verliert. Noch dazu kommt das so gut wie jeder Killer nur camped was den Spielspaß dann unterirdisch werden lässt. Wenn das Spiel wieder ausbalancierter wird kann man über eine gute Bewertung reden aber so nicht.

So first off before I start talking about the review, I just want to say that I absolutely love this game. I've met so many awesome people because of this game, yet I still don't recommend this game for various reasons.

This game has so much potential, but all of this potential gets wasted by the devs. 
The reasons I don't recommend this game:

1) This game is broken. Dbd has so many bugs and is very poorly optimized. This game is riddled with bugs. Instead of fixing these bugs, the devs spend time on adding new content to the game, behind a payment wall of course. Every update there are new bugs. At this point there aren't any bugs in the game, but there is a game in the bug. The devs don't care about their players, they care about their wallet. Instead of actually fixing dbd, new updates are being added every x months. It sucks...

2) This game is unbalanced. There are many OP and broken items and perks in the game for both survivor and killer. I'm convinced this game doesn't have a balancing team as all of the things they do are just unreasonable and random. Instead of trying to balance this game and listening to the community, the devs decide to make new DLC and make changes to things that are perfectly fine. They recently updated one of the most balanced killers in the game, like WTF nobody asked. fix your game. Some killers are too OP and some are too weak, but the devs just don't seem to care... Also the ranking doesn't work, it is awful. You can get matched up against people who have 2x your playtime.

3) The community. The community is divided into two groups, survivor and killer mains. Both sides absolutely seem to hate each other. The community is also very very toxic. Every game I play I get people t-bagging me and just playing in such a toxic way. Just taking a look at the comments on my profile should kind of give you an idea about how the community is. I know there is toxicity in every game, but this is just ridiculous. 

4) Pay to win and grinding. To get decent perks in the game and If you want to have a good time, you have to buy the DLC. Also the amount of grinding you have to do in this game is INSANE. You can buy characters for free with shards, which is one of the currencies in this game. But to get a decent amount of shards you'd have to grind off your ass. This game is hella pay to win. 

TL;DR:
The devs are greedy, this game is riddled with bugs. the community is awful and this game has way too many micro-transactions. 

I hope you found this review usefull.


Update 20.06.2021

I wrote this review on 24 Dec, 2019. Right now it's about 6 months later and none of the problems I previously adressed have been fixed. In fact, the game sucks even more right now with a broken chapter (the resident evil chapter). It angers me how money hungry Behavior actually is.


---A good summary about the current situation----
https://www.reddit.com/r/deadbydaylight/comments/o7x9mw/bhvr_boycott_followup_read_this_please/

#DeadByBoycott


Please avoid this game, it's not worth your money. Dbd would be a free to play game at best considering how much it sucks.


Update 19.10.2021
Guess what, the devs have screwed us over again. 
At this point I'm not even surprised...
